{
  "name": "mastra-slack-agent",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "",
  "main": "index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "vitest run",
    "dev": "mastra dev",
    "dev:slack": "tsx --watch src/index.ts",
    "build": "mastra build",
    "start": "node dist/index.js",
    "start:slack": "tsx src/index.ts",
    "typecheck": "tsc --noEmit",
    "lint": "eslint src",
    "lint:fix": "eslint src --fix",
    "format": "prettier --write \"src/**/*.ts\"",
    "format:check": "prettier --check \"src/**/*.ts\"",
    "prepare": "husky"
  },
  "keywords": [],
  "author": "",
  "license": "MIT",
  "type": "module",
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=22.13.0"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@ai-sdk/openai": "^3.0.29",
    "@mastra/core": "^1.4.0",
    "@mastra/evals": "^1.1.1",
    "@mastra/libsql": "^1.4.0",
    "@mastra/loggers": "^1.0.1",
    "@mastra/memory": "^1.3.0",
    "@slack/bolt": "^4.6.0",
    "date-fns": "^4.1.0",
    "googleapis": "^168.0.0",
    "zod": "^4.1.13"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@eslint/js": "^9.39.2",
    "@types/node": "^25.0.2",
    "dotenv": "^17.2.3",
    "eslint": "^9.39.2",
    "eslint-config-prettier": "^10.1.8",
    "eslint-plugin-prettier": "^5.5.4",
    "husky": "^9.1.7",
    "mastra": "^1.0.1",
    "prettier": "^3.7.4",
    "tsx": "^4.21.0",
    "typescript": "^5.9.3",
    "typescript-eslint": "^8.49.0",
    "vitest": "^4.0.15"
  }
}
